'''Graven Innocence''' is a [[Flagship Event]] in [[Version 3.0]].

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
* Complete "[[The Trail of the God of Wisdom]]" in [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter III]]: Act I "[[Through Mists of Smoke and Forests Dark]]"
** If the player has not completed the Archon Quest "The Trail of the God of Wisdom" during the event, they can enter the event through "Quick Start" in the event page after completing the Archon Quest [[Prologue]]: Act I - "[[The Outlander Who Caught the Wind]]."
* The Chapter of Foliage page of the Snapshots album of the Roaming the Jungle activity requires the completion of [[The World of Aranara]] quest of the [[Aranyaka]] world quest series.

===Summary===
* During the event, complete the quest "[[The Unappreciated Carving]]" to invite the character "Sprout of Rebirth" [[Collei]] (Dendro). Help the staff in Acara Crafts find assistants and collect inspiration regarding toy-making to obtain [[Primogem]]s, [[Crown of Insight]], [[Character Level-Up Materials]], [[Talent Level-Up Materials]], and event-exclusive [[Furnishings]], etc.
* Complete the quest "The Unappreciated Carving" during the event to invite the character "Sprout of Rebirth" Collei (Dendro), and unlock events like "[[Graven Innocence/Meticulous Craftsmanship|Meticulous Craftsmanship]]," "[[Graven Innocence/Roaming the Jungle|Roaming the Jungle]]," "[[Graven Innocence/Metamorphosis of Wood|Metamorphosis of Wood]]," etc.
* "Roaming the Jungle" includes gameplay like Snapshots, Behemoth Observation, Grove Dash, and Braving the Elements. These gameplay modes will be unlocked over the course of the event.
* In the Behemoth Observation of "Roaming the Jungle," the challenge quest can only be completed by challenging the [[Electro Regisvine]] and [[Jadeplume Terrorshroom]] in the wilds.
* Complete various quests in "Roaming the Jungle" to get "[[Whimsical Draft]]s" and "[[Creative Note]]s," which can be used to exchange for Carving Components, Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character Level-Up Materials, Talent Level-Up Materials, etc.
* Go to the showcase in "Metamorphosis of Wood" and use Carving Components to assemble an Aranara Woodcarving. Complete the quest to get corresponding rewards. There is a limit to the number of carvings that can be displayed, though this number will increase as the event progresses.
* After the event gameplay period ends, Whimsical Drafts and Creative Notes will disappear. Please make sure to claim the rewards in time.
